com.b2international.snowowl.api.admin

Interface IRepositoryService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InternalRepositoryService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RepositoryServiceImpl

    public interface IRepositoryService
    Implementations of the repository service allow creating on-line backups of terminology content repositories by preventing further modifications while the backup takes place.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<String> getRepositoryUuids()
      Retrieves the unique identifier of each running repository that stores terminology content.
      List<String> getRepositoryVersionIds(String repositoryUuid)
      Retrieves all version identifiers for the specified repository.
      void lockGlobal(int timeoutMillis)
      Places a global lock, which prevents other users from making changes to any of the repositories while a backup is created.
      void lockRepository(String repositoryUuid, int timeoutMillis)
      Places a repository-level lock, which prevents other users from making changes to the repository identified by repositoryUuid.
      void unlockGlobal()
      Releases a previously acquired global lock.
      void unlockRepository(String repositoryUuid)
      Releases a previously acquired repository-level lock on the repository identified by repositoryUuid.

    • Method Detail

      • getRepositoryUuids

        List<String> getRepositoryUuids()
        Retrieves the unique identifier of each running repository that stores terminology content.
        Returns:
        a list of repository identifiers, in alphabetical order (never null)

      • lockGlobal

        void lockGlobal(int timeoutMillis)
        Places a global lock, which prevents other users from making changes to any of the repositories while a backup is created. The call may block up to the specified timeout to acquire the lock; if timeoutMillis is set to 0, it returns immediately.
        Parameters:
        timeoutMillis - lock timeout in milliseconds (may not be negative)
        Throws:
        LockException - if the global lock could not be acquired for any reason (including cases when a conflicting lock is already held by someone else)

      • unlockGlobal

        void unlockGlobal()
        Releases a previously acquired global lock.
        Throws:
        LockException - if the global lock could not be released for any reason (including cases when it was not held)

      • lockRepository

        void lockRepository(String repositoryUuid,
                    int timeoutMillis)
        Places a repository-level lock, which prevents other users from making changes to the repository identified by repositoryUuid. The call may wait up to the specified timeout to acquire the lock; if timeoutMillis is set to 0, it returns immediately.
        Parameters:
        repositoryUuid - a unique identifier pointing to a particular repository (may not be null)
        timeoutMillis - lock timeout in milliseconds (may not be negative)
        Throws:
        RepositoryNotFoundException - if the specified repository UUID does not correspond to any repository
        LockException - if the repository lock could not be acquired for any reason (including cases when a conflicting lock is already held by someone else)

      • unlockRepository

        void unlockRepository(String repositoryUuid)
        Releases a previously acquired repository-level lock on the repository identified by repositoryUuid.
        Parameters:
        repositoryUuid - a unique identifier pointing to a particular repository (may not be null)
        Throws:
        RepositoryNotFoundException - if the specified repository UUID does not correspond to any repository
        LockException - if the repository lock could not be released for any reason (including cases when it was not held)

      • getRepositoryVersionIds

        List<String> getRepositoryVersionIds(String repositoryUuid)
        Retrieves all version identifiers for the specified repository.
        Parameters:
        repositoryUuid - a unique identifier pointing to a particular repository (may not be null)
        Returns:
        a list of repository version identifiers, in alphabetical order (never null)
        Throws:
        RepositoryNotFoundException - if the specified repository UUID does not correspond to any repository
